content: > invite the gang over for tea and show off this beginner crochet placemat and coaster set red heart eco-cotton blend makes this set lovely in a neutral for an elegant finish if you have something more colorful in mind let your creativity shine by selecting another shade it s easy impressive and a satisfying first project to build up your confidence turn an ordinary dinner into a special one by setting the table with crocheted placemats and coasters you made yourself they re easy to crochet and they work up fast so you can make a set for each member of your family in no time skill level beginner 1 ball of yarn makes 1 placemat and 1 coaster
